abstract: The bankrupt luxury travel company won approval to sell its membership list and a handful of properties to a rival, Demeure, which has also agreed to lease several resorts as well.
snippet: The bankrupt luxury travel company won approval to sell its membership list and a handful of properties to a rival, Demeure, which has also agreed to lease several resorts as well.
lead_paragraph: 6:01 p.m. | Updated Members of Ultimate Escapes, the bankrupt provider of luxury vacations to places like Tahoe and Tuscany, needn’t worry about losing their status.

headline.main: Bankrupt Ultimate Escapes Wins Approval for Sale

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
